effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains Special Attack effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Special Attack effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
虽然携带后速度会降低，
但宝可梦的特攻
会比平时成长得更高。

持たせると　素早さが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　特攻が
高く　育ちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed
but allows the holder’s Sp. Atk stat to grow more
after battling.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon. Riduce la Velocità
nella lotta ma permette ai punti base dell’Attacco
Speciale di crescere più rapidamente.

Potencia el Ataque Especial de base, pero reduce
la Velocidad en combate. Debe llevarla un
Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Erhöht nach dem Kampf den
Spezial-Angriffs-Wert, senkt aber die Initiative.

Objet à tenir. Permet à l’Attaque Spéciale de
progresser plus vite, mais réduit la Vitesse
pendant le combat.
